Wisdom: اجْعَلْ زَمَانَ رَخَائِكَ [رَجَائِكَ‏] عُدَّةً لِأَيَّامِ بَلَائِكَ
enWisdom: Make your time of comfort a [means of] preparation for the days of your tribulation

Wisdom: مَاضِي يَوْمِكَ فَائِتٌ وَآتِيهِ مُتَّهَمٌ وَوَقْتُكَ مُغْتَنَمٌ فَبَادِرْ فِيهِ فُرْصَةَ الْإِمْكَانِ وَإِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَثِقَ بِالزَّمَانِ
enWisdom: What has passed of your day is lost, what is to come is uncertain; your time is a blessing, so make haste in it while you have the opportunity, and beware of relying on the future

Wisdom: الْفُرَصُ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ السَّحَابِ
enWisdom: Opportunities pass by like the passing of clouds

Wisdom: انْتَهِزُوا فُرَصَ الْخَيْرِ فَإِنَّهَا تَمُرُّ مَرَّ السَّحَابِ
enWisdom: Seize good opportunities, for indeed they pass by [quickly] like the passing of clouds

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْفُرَصَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ السَّحَابِ فَانْتَهِزُوهَا إِذَا أَمْكَنَتْ فِي أَبْوَابِ الْخَيْرِ وَإِلَّا عَادَتْ نَدَماً
enWisdom: Verily opportunities pass away [quickly] like the clouds, so seize them when they arise in the gates of good, otherwise they will turn into regrets

Wisdom: الْفُرْصَةُ سَرِيعَةُ الْفَوْتِ وَبَطِيئَةُ الْعَوْدِ
enWisdom: Opportunity is quick to pass on and slow to return

Wisdom: الْفُرْصَةُ غُنْمٌ
enWisdom: Opportunity is a booty

Wisdom: الْمَرْءُ ابْنُ سَاعَتِهِ [بَيْنَ سَاعَتَيْهِ‏]
enWisdom: Man is the son of his time

Wisdom: التُّؤَدَةُ مَمْدُوحَةٌ فِي كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ إِلَّا فِي أَفْعَالِ الْبِرِّ
enWisdom: Acting slowly is praiseworthy in everything except in opportunities for [doing] good

Wisdom: التَّثَبُّتُ خَيْرٌ مِنَ الْعَجَلَةِ إِلَّا فِي فُرَصِ الْبِرِّ
enWisdom: Taking time [to ascertain] is better than making haste, except in opportunities for [doing] good

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الرَّأْيِ مَا لَمْ يَفُتِ الْفُرَصَ وَلَمْ يُورِثِ الْغُصَصَ
enWisdom: The best opinion is one which neither causes opportunities to be wasted nor brings about distress

Wisdom: أَشَدُّ الْغُصَصِ فَوْتُ الْفُرَصِ
enWisdom: The greatest distress is [caused by] loss of opportunities

Wisdom: إِذَا أَمْكَنَتِ الْفُرْصَةُ فَانْتَهِزْهَا فَإِنَّ إِضَاعَةَ الْفُرْصَةِ غُصَّةٌ
enWisdom: When the opportunity arises, then seize it, for indeed wasting an opportunity leads to distress

Wisdom: بَادِرِ الْفُرْصَةَ قَبْلَ أَنْ تَكُونَ غُصَّةً
enWisdom: Hurry to take advantage of opportunity before it becomes [a cause of] distress

Wisdom: خُذُوا مَهَلَ الْأَيَّامِ وَحُوطُوا قَوَاصِيَ الْإِسْلَامِ وَبَادِرُوا هُجُومَ الْحِمَامِ
enWisdom: Take the respite of the days, protect the boundaries of Islam, and anticipate the sudden attack of death

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً اغْتَنَمَ الْمَهَلَ وَبَادَرَ الْعَمَلَ وَأَكْمَشَ [وَ أَكْثَرَ] مِنْ وَجَلٍ
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy on the one who takes the benefit of respite [and opportunity], hastens towards good deeds and cowers out of fear [of Allah]

Wisdom: شِيمَةُ الْأَتْقِيَاءِ اغْتِنَامُ الْمُهْلَةِ وَالتَّزَوُّدُ لِلرَّحْلَةِ
enWisdom: The practice of the God-wary is taking advantage of respite and preparing provisions for the [final] journey

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ قَصَّرَ أَمَلَهُ وَاغْتَنَمَ مَهَلَهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is he who shortens his hopes and makes good use of his time

Wisdom: غَافِصِ [عافص‏] الْفُرْصَةَ عِنْدَ إِمْكَانِهَا فَإِنَّكَ غَيْرُ مُدْرِكِهَا بَعْدَ فَوْتِهَا
enWisdom: Seize the opportunity when it arises, for indeed you will not get it [again] after you lose it

Wisdom: قَدْ تُصَابُ الْفُرْصَةُ
enWisdom: At times an opportunity may arise

Wisdom: لَيْسَ كُلُّ غَائِبٍ يَئُوبُ
enWisdom: Not everything that has gone comes back

Wisdom: مَنْ غَافَصَ [من غامض‏] الْفُرَصَ أَمِنَ الْغُصَصَ
enWisdom: One who takes advantage of [unexpected] opportunities remains safe from distress

Wisdom: مَنْ نَاهَزَ الْفُرْصَةَ أَمِنَ الْغُصَّةَ
enWisdom: One who seizes the opportunity is saved from distress

Wisdom: مَنْ وَجَدَ مَوْرِداً عَذْباً يَرْتَوِي مِنْهُ فَلَمْ يَغْتَنِمْهُ يُوشِكُ أَنْ يَظْمَأَ وَيَطْلُبَهُ فَلَا يَجِدَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever finds a place where sweet water enters and he can quench his thirst with it but does not take advantage of it, he will soon feel thirsty and seek it, but will not find it
